gcci.text: With H100 spot prices averaging $3.16/hour—far below typical list pricing—cloud hardware is now in a clear supply‑chain glut, extending capex payback beyond a year and pressuring providers to accelerate migrations to H200/GB200 to preserve margins.

gtpi.text: At an average $1.25 per 1M input tokens, DeepSeek’s API pricing is aggressively reshaping token economics, triggering price wars that compress margins and force competitors to optimize throughput and distillation to stay viable.

gagl.text: AI’s annual 120 TWh load adds material grid strain and a sizable carbon footprint, accelerating the case for new nuclear and long‑duration storage to meet reliability and decarbonization targets.

aipi.text: Hardware and token price compression is fueling rapid AI growth, but persistent margin pressure, energy intensity, and speculative funding raise bubble risks and heighten scrutiny on sustainable economics.
